editorialNotes.standard: Colourful chaos awaits in our 2016 iPhone Game of the Year. Supercell‚Äôs awesome card battler delivers excellent deck-building mechanics and fast-paced fights in a package that‚Äôs easy to understand and undeniably fun. Upgrading, unlocking and experimenting with cards gives the game endless replayability, and deciding just where to drop your heroes makes each battle distinct. But no matter how good your deck is, there‚Äôs no substitute for skill and quick thinking.
editorialNotes.short: Collect powerful cards and crush your competition.

editorialNotes.standard: It‚Äôs hard to understate Clash of Clans‚Äô massive influence in establishing complex strategic multiplayer on mobile‚Äìwe still love logging on to find that our meticulously placed and upgraded fortifications survived another onslaught.

editorialNotes.standard: Years ago, Plants vs. Zombies defined a genre with its fresh concept, undeniable charm and innovative, balanced gameplay. Now the undead have risen again, bringing with them new time-travelling tales and a massive slew of new zombies and plants. Whether you stomp foes without spending any money or you buy new experimental plants and power-ups with In-App Purchases, the result is the same: an incredible sequel that's fresh and fun throughout, reminding us why we fell in love with this world in the first place.

editorialNotes.short: Enable the "Farm to Table" mode to play this relaxing idle game in a new way.
